Attributes.description: Introduction to phonetics and phonology; training in the identification and production of speech sounds; principles and methods for describing and writing the sound system of a language; phonological theory with reference to selected languages; the interface between phonology and morphology. Analytical practice and seminar discussion.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
